Name: Gennaro's Sidecar
Ingredients: 10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: My version of the established Jamie's Italian Gennaro's Sidecar is a tad boozier than the original, but retains the balance between sweet limoncello liqueur and tart lemon juice.
History: Adapted from a popular drink on the menu of Jamie's Italian restaurant and bar chain. See: Sidecar cocktail history
Nutrition: One serving of Gennaro's Sidecar contains 128 calories
